      • Weapon

        public Weapon(Projectile in_proj,

        Creates a weapon
        Parameters:

        in_rate - rate of fire in miliseconds

    • Method Detail

      • launch

        public Projectile[] launch(double in_x,
                  double in_y,
                  double angle)
        Checks if the weapon has reloaded. If yes, creates an array of Projectiles to be used later in the Game->Land classes.
        Parameters:
        in_x - X coordinate from where to launch
        in_y - Y coordinate from where to launch
        angle - Angle in which the projectile is launched
        Returns:
        Returns an array of launched projectiles. If weapon is not reloaded yet, returns null.
